name: 當代教育心理學專題研討
description: 1.了解當代教育心理學領域中重要的研究議題與發展趨勢，以及在教學上的應用。 2.藉由課程討論研擬論文研究方向及研究問題。
goals: 熟悉當代教育心理學領域中重要的研究議題與發展趨勢
探討如何將理論應用於教學
藉由專題計畫撰寫，培養分析與整合能力
syllabus:
第一週：課程介紹

第二週：PhilosophicalPerspectives on Mind, Nature, and Educational Psychology

        Modesof Inquiry in Educational Psychology and Learning Sciences Research

第三週： The Work of Educational Psychologists in aDigitally Networked World.

         TheProspects and Limitations of Latent Variable Models in Educational Psychology.

第四週：Learning as Coordination: Cognitive Psychology and Education.

        Emotions and Emotion Regulation inAcademic Settings

第五週：Motivation

        Volition

第六週：Human Cognitive Abilities: TheirOrganization, Development, and Use.

        Cognition and Cognitive Disabilities.

第七週：PersonalCapability Beliefs.

         Motivation Interventions in Education: BridgingTheory, Research, and Practice.

第八週：Beyond theShadow: The Role of Personality and Temperament in Learning.

        Cultural,Racial/Ethnic, and Linguistic Diversity and Identity.

第九週：影片欣賞

第十週：Character Education, Moral Education, and Moral-CharacterEducation.

        Literacy for Schooling: Two-Tiered Scaffoldingfor Learning and Teaching

第十一週：SocioculturalPerspectives on Literacy and Learning.

          Learning Environments In and Out of School.

第十二週：NetworkedLearning.

          Collaborative Learning

  

第十三週： Dialogic Instruction: A New Frontier.

           Assessment Illuminating Pathways to Learning

第十四週： Being a Teacher: Efficacy, Emotions, andInterpersonal Relationships in the Classroom

第十五週：LanguageDevelopment

         Studying Historical Understanding.

第十六週：Toward anEducational Psychology of Mathematics Education.

          Civic Education.

第十七週：Warm Change about Hot Topics: The Role ofMotivation and Emotion in Attitude and Conceptual Change about ControversialScience Topics

Functional Scientific Literacy: Seeing theScience within the Words and Across the Web.

第十八週：課程回饋與檢討

methodologies.note: 授課老師講授課程重點
針對關鍵問題進行討論與辯論
學生分組合作研讀內容並進行報告

grading.note: 課堂報告以及參與討論程度
